David Kennedy

Media Specialist

A Digital Media Specialist, with fifteen years of industry experience.

Archiving and Unarchiving. Cloning, loading and unloading drives, and LTOs. File format conversions, and QC of DI reels for film out.

VFX Editor / IO Coordinator

ScanLineVFX LA

Oct 2010 - Mar 2011

Bringing plates and elements online, file conversion and renaming, checking lineups and CamData, verifying VFX comps against client edits using Avid Media Composer and FCP. Running VFX Dailies, and Screening.

Roto / Tasking Artist

Prime Focus VFX Services Inc

Jun 2010 - Aug 2010

Worked on a short contract as a tasking and roto artist in the 2d-3d pipeline process for Stereo Conversions using Digital Fusion. The job demanded long hours, initiative and attention to detail.

Projects:
